item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 20, 2024 at 9:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump’s $175mn bond should be invalidated, New York attorney-general says
2. Nvidia drops 10% as investors see risk in Big Tech shares
3. Democrats back Republican Speaker’s plan to advance US aid to Ukraine
4. Israel launches calibrated retaliatory strikes against Iran
5. Ken Griffin’s trading firm blasts Trump Media boss as ‘loser’
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, April 20, 2024 at 9:50 AM UTC
